game: Free Spacer is a contemporary science fiction tabletop roleplaying game in which you play the troubleshooting crew of a small starship in a sandbox setting of your own choice
version: These sheets have been updated for the release version of Free Spacer
instructions: The sheet has two tabs: one for the the ship and one for crewmembers. It has a sheet roll for each skill, which lets you choose the specialty used.
